revised_title: Exploring the Bands in the Spectrum and Their Theoretical Explanation
tldr: The author investigates the phenomenon of dark bands seen in a spectrum when light passes through a fluid prism and a transparent plate. They explain the formation of these bands using the theory of interference and discuss the implications for determining refractive indices and dispersion of substances. The author also provides a method for calculating the number of bands seen in a given part of the spectrum.
